13 static const int LASER_FIELD_OF_VIEW = 140;
14 static const double LASER_LIMIT = 0.2;
15 static const double RAD_ROBOT = 0.2;

21 ObstacleDetection::ObstacleDetection()

31 bool ObstacleDetection::detectObtacle(sensor_msgs::LaserScan::ConstPtr laserScan)
32 {
33 
34  double laser_reading = laserScan->range_max; // get max reading
35  int range_start = (laserScan->ranges.size() / 2) - (LASER_FIELD_OF_VIEW / 2); // consider star of FOV
36  int range_end = (laserScan->ranges.size() / 2) + (LASER_FIELD_OF_VIEW / 2); //consider end of FOV
37  for (unsigned int i = range_start; i <= range_end; i++)
38  {
39  if (laserScan->ranges.at(i) < laser_reading)
40  {
41  laser_reading = laserScan->ranges.at(i); // Store laser reading
42  }
43  }
44  if (laser_reading <= LASER_LIMIT + RAD_ROBOT) // check if condition is valid
45  {
46  return false;
47  }
48  else
49  {
50  return true;
51  }
52 }
59 double ObstacleDetection::getLaserReading(sensor_msgs::LaserScan::ConstPtr laserScan)
60 {
61 
62  int range_start = (laserScan->ranges.size() / 2) - (LASER_FIELD_OF_VIEW / 2); // consider star of FOV
63  int range_end = (laserScan->ranges.size() / 2) + (LASER_FIELD_OF_VIEW / 2); //consider end of FOV
64  for (unsigned int i = range_start; i <= range_end; i++)
65  {
66  if (laserScan->ranges.at(i) < laser_reading_)
67  {
68  laser_reading_ = laserScan->ranges.at(i); // store closest reading
69  }
70  }
71  return laser_reading_; // return closes reading
72 }
